Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1900 A.D.–present
Description: Trade cards from the "Ball Players" series (E145). Two sets were issued, one in 1914 (144 cards) and a reissue in 1915 (176 cards), to be distributed in boxes of Cracker Jack.
